about: Experience leading product from concept to reality.
2 years oversea working experience. Able to work with virtual team and deliver project successfully.
Experience managing a team and coaching junior team members.
Certified PMP. Experience with both traditional project management and Agile Scrum methodology.

experienceList.title: Product Manager
experienceList.description:
Responsible for Mercer's individual insurance product line, leading developments of products and solutions including: 
 A D2C insurance mall that provides clients with online insurance and policy related services 
 A B2A2C platform that empowers the brokers to aquire customer via wechat, develop business online. 
 And B2B solutions that integrate with multiple systems to provide insurance to large enterprise as well as SME.

experienceList.title: Business Analyst
Software Engineer
experienceList.description: Focus on AvePoint product 'DocAve' customization development, feature enhancement and customer issue.

skills: Data Driven, Good Visualization & Presenting Skill
